title: Making Sense Of The Zeke Situation (Football 09/01)
description:
On a Football Friday addition of the Pick Six podcast Nick Kostos, Will Brinson and Jason La Canfora dive deep into the Ezekiel Elliott suspension situation (1:35).  The guys also discuss whether or not there's an impending work stoppage (17:05), the latest on the Colts QB situation (21:25), Pat Mahomes looking good in preseason (25:55), Could Nathan Peterman start week 1 for the Bills? (28:02), and Joe Haden landing with the Steelers (32:40)
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
